content.detailedDescription:
My sighting occurred on september 6, 2008 at approximately 7:30 pm. est.
the sky was clear, the moon was beginning to shine in the southern sky.
i walked over to my mother's house next door for a chat and walk.
we live on a 14 acre country property just outside of london, ontario.
we talked for a few minutes on her outside deck.  i remember commenting
to her how much sooner the moon was shining in the daylight sky with the
days getting shorter.  i proceeded to take a walk around our property
together with my 14 year old daughter.  during our walk, my daughter
noticed a couple of "birds" flying just above the moon.  she commented
how the birds made a face with the moon.  i looked up and started to 
realize the two objects were not birds but something else.
as they got closer, they became larger, appearing like missiles.
i started to scream to my mother to come out to see these two objects.
the objects dipped down and levelled off right above us in the field,
no more than a mile up.  i continued to scream for my mother as the 
two ufo's began to slowly move over top of us in a north-east direction.
it was truly incredible sight.  my mother had come out of her house onto the deck and witnessed these two objects moving over us, and at the same time, a third similar ufo appeared above my mother's house about 
100 feet from where we were standing.  all these ufo's were massive
in size, flying closely together in a staggered formation.  the third
ufo was slightly higher and slightly ahead of the other two ufo's.
i would estimate that each ufo was about 150 feet long.  they were shaped
like a bullet, bulging slightly in the middle with small fins protruding
off the sides.  the objects were metallic, with smooth surfaces, dull
grey in color, no lights, no markings and no identifiable features except
for the small fins.  they simply moved slowly north-east, making no sounds
whatsoever.  there was never any exhaust, no trailing vapor/smoke.  i just
remember how quiet it all was.  we all then witnessed the three ufo's
begin to ascend upward in a 50 degree angle in a north-east direction, straight out away from us, becoming smaller and smaller until they disappeared from our view.  the ufo's did not fly horizon to horizon, but came from due south,levelling off and then flying north-east, straight up
and out beyond our sight.  everything happened in about 4 minutes.
we could not belive what we had just witnessed, it felt like we were in
a movie with special effects.  i drew a sketch of what the objects 
appeared like right after this happened.  i called the london airport
the next day to ask if any unusual sightings were reported.  they told
me that there were no air shows going on and nothing unusual on their radar that evening.  unfortunately,  i did not have a camera with me.
content.summary: Three missile-like ufo's sighted

content.detailedDescription:
On friday 15th august,2008 at bath university campus at around 2-45 to 3 in the morning, myself and 3 colleagues were stargazing.  the moon had been out earlier in the evening but was not visible later.  the sky was still quite dark but completly clear and the stars were visible.  i noticed what looked like a far off galaxy with a cluster of very faint tiny stars inside.  it was only when this 'galaxy' moved across the sky with its 'stars' still equidistant inside it - in what seemed like a transparent elongated but dumpy blimp shape which was fatter in the middle, going at what i perceived at the time was the wrong way across the sky, for any normal worldy phenomenon.  it moved across the sky silently and quite low down and was enormous in size. it floated towards us, curving across the sky away from its original direction and went directly above us all.  we were all astonished, with mouths gaped open and pointing fingers in the air shouting.  as it passed over us, either side of it seemed to bend in a curve over us and as i looked directly above me, i could still see its stars inside it, still equidistant; although unless of course the light was bent and i was seeing a reflection of other stars.  it had a haze or glimmer of what i can only explain as like a magnetic field or the shimmer you get on a very hot road/highway with like heatwaves transparently shimmering around it.  as it passed over and began to go past, i could only see it for a second or so because it was very hard to keep track of because it just blended into the early morning, but still dark sky. when i got back to my room my watch was not working.

i got in touch with the bbc sky at night programme to see if anything was due over the area (star wise) to account for what we had seen and got a reply stating that they did not know of anything that it could be.  they said they would like to put it in their bbc sky at night magazine and i agreed that they could.  this i know sounds ridiculous, but this is exactly what happened and what i saw.  when we tried to tell people about what we all saw, we were laughed at and all kinds of ridiculous things were given as possible explanations.  

suffice it to say that as mature people doing research at the university of bath, (who where not drunk either) as has been also proposed, we all saw something which shocked us.  so much so that only two of us have discussed it once and the other two will not discuss it at all.  it has profoundly affected myself (and i am a professional person and ex. met. police, in as much as i am constantly looking up at the sky in case it appears again.  whilst this was an astonishing thing to see, it was also extremely frightening.  therefore i would like to remain anonymous.

nb  whether this is of any relevance or not.  two days prior to the sighting my battery clock began ringing in the early hours of the morning on both days, instead of at the correct time of 7:30.  i was convinced that someone had been in my room and messed around with my clock at the time, for a joke.  this was mentioned to colleagues and family at the time as something very strange for anyone to be bothered to do. 

there have been a couple of pictures on the web which look very much like this thing, under the heading of transparent ufo or semi-transparent ufo. because i was unable to photograph this thing myself, unfortunately this is the only way i have been able to explain visually what i saw.  pictures showing it or similar sourced from the internet are given below and are at:
http://img513.Imageshack.Us/img513/8017/ufopj4.Jpg
http://www.Abovetopsecret.Com/forum/thread280281/pg1
content.summary: Elongated transparent blimp shaped with minute stars/lights inside its magnetic-type hazed shape

content.detailedDescription:
Although i was twelve years of age at the time of my sighting, i remember it as though it had happened yesterday.  i was watching tv with my sister, who was home visiting from college, and i heard my dog going crazy outside. i got up and looked out of the big picture window in my family's den to see what was upsetting the dog.  

about 300ft away from our back yard was a field near a large wooded area where my friends and i often rode bikes and played.  this is where i spotted the craft.  it was approximately 15-20 ft in diameter, and was what appeared to be a mix between and oval and a disc-shape.  the actual base color of the object was what i would call a silvery-blue...Almost like a hue. the surface was solid...I could easily see that.  however, the surface of the object seemed to have a property that most would consider to be iridescent.  i say this because the surface was multi-colored, but the colors were not seperately defined...They appeared to be pulsating/swirling and mixing together...It was really beautiful.  the light source itself appeared to be coming from a central location within the object. (i couldn't actually see the source which was producing the light that was pulsating through the iridescent surface of the object, so i assume that it may have come from a centralized location within the object itself.)

after i first saw the object, i called my older sister over to see it.  i distinctly remember her saying, "oh my god! what is that?!?"  it was right after she joined me at the window that i noticed the tv in our den was horribly static-filled and was having some audio problems as well.  

at this point, my sister and i ran outside into the back yard and kept watching the object, which at first had just been hovering, but was now moving very slowly, (estimate of 5-10 mph), to the right.  this movement resulted in the object occassionally being obtructed from view by patches of trees from the wooded area about 300ft away.  it would slowly go behind the trees, and then slowly re-emerge on the other side.  i remember wondering why it could be so close and so big, (esp to a 12y/o boy), but make no sound whatsoever! however, our dog was making so much sound, i'm surprised the whole neighborhood didnt come to find out what was going on.

towards the end of the sighting, which i believe to have been around 5 mins total, the object went behind a thick patch of trees and never re-emerged from the other side. i saw what appeared to be a flash higher in the sky and more to the right, which could have been an instantaneous take- off of the object, but that is merely speculation. it's almost as though it just disappeared.  it may have landed at that point, but i cannot say that for sure.  i do know that there were no other houses in that direction...Just the field and the woods.  i have wished many times since then that i had jumped on my bike and chased after it...But unfortunately i did not.  i do remember that i was so impacted by the event that i wanted to study whatever i could about ufos, but one of the only sources i had were my family's old world book encyclopedias.  i remember that i read about project blue book, and was thrilled that there was a government oraganization designated for ufo research, and was excited that i could report what i had seen.  so, i wrote a detailed letter about the event, and included my own drawings and diagrams of what i had seen.  little did i know, since it was 1988 at the time, project blue book had closed almost 20 yrs before.  i did, however, get a letter in return informing me that blue book was no longer in operation.  i'm surprised anyone responded at all.

one final comment about this sighting...I have, for years, wondered why it may have been that what i consider to have been an authentic ufo would have been "snooping around" near my home in such a small town in south carolina?  what i consider to be the answer to that question hit me just recently while doing a lot more reading on ufos.  located within about five miles of my home at the time, and from my whole city for that matter, is the lake robinson nuclear power plant.  i'm not surprised anymore that they were in our area!
content.summary: Multi-colored, iridescent oval disc witnessed at distance of 300ft with no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at about 2:25 a.M. to smoke a cigarette. i sat down in my usual spot, and i happened to glance up at about a 45 degree angle from the ground, and i noticed a bright blinking light. at first i thought it was an airplane, but then i saw that it wasn't actually moving anywhere. it was staying in the same spot, but the blinking light was throwing colors that i've never seen on a close venus or mars experience, and it was too bright to be a satellite...And airplanes don't have pink lights on them.

i kept my focus on the light, and i realized there was a random pattern emerging. the base color was white, but then i'd see the color change in sets of threes. it went right to left, and the colors it was giving off were pink, purple, green, blue, red, and orange. it was as bright as an airplane coming in for landing, but it was too far away. there weren't any other stars in the sky at this time, and it wasn't moving.

after about 7 minutes of just watching the light, it faded and then disappeared. 

if this were the first time this had happened, i would probably be terrified. frankly, it's not. it happens from time to time, and i can go a couple years without seeing one, or a couple months. there's no set pattern of when i see it.

it was pretty how it sparkled, but the lights were distinct features when each color came on.
content.summary: Blinking stationary light in southeast sky, too bright to be a planet or satellite.

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place in my home town just out side of eugene oregon in the mid-summer of 1995. much like every other weekend our nearby aunts and uncles would gather for dinner at my grandmothers house and us grandkids would hang out outside. most of the time we would look up into the vast night sky which many stars were visible out there.(being out of any city light)on this night my cousin;17, my brother;13 and myself;15 years old (at that time),   were looking out into the southern sky and above us. below this sky is an endless range of large hills rolling through our area all the way to the coast. 

   from hill tops to right above us we scanned the sky and nothing but the stars were out. all of a sudden after about 20 minutes of gazing, i had been looking just above and ahead in more of a southeast direction. some kind of light radiated from a central point in that spot in the sky. i  immediately  shouted to my brother and cousin. ���look!'. it had already passed by the time they looked out to what i was pointing at. but not 3 seconds had passed when we all together sough it again but it seemed brighter this time and in 2 or three simultaneous ripples. i say ripples because that is how i saw it. they were two or three split second pulses of bluish -white light radiating and growing like ripples in a pond when throwing a pebble. this whole event took no longer than 3 to 5 seconds. the light that rippled seemed to almost follow the contour of our outer atmosphere's dome. though that was interesting and creepy at the same time; not 2 seconds later did we see a single pinpoint of red light in that same general area. this light was like a star but a constant red. in our excitement we kept our eyes glued to this point of light. the light then started to move and get slightly bigger and brighter. the light now was definitely moving, not blinking, but appeared to move at  great speed and in sharp angle downward and toward the west. with in seconds the object ended up about a mile away it seemed. all three of us owing and aching and briefly discussing how fast it must have traveling compared to a jet. the red light hovered  above a tree line on a hill just south of us. straight ahead of us. my brother pointed out light from the object hitting the tree tops. the red light was faint and it did appear that close to the trees. it seemed like we were watching it for quite a while, just sitting there hovering . there was no apparent movement; no flashing or blinking of the light. the object had a constant deep red light like a red led. we were sure as we spoke to each other right than and there that it was not moving. the light had not changed in size or direction. all of a sudden after about 10 minutes it rows and took a sharp south eastern direction and then just disappeared. 

                i have seen two more similar sightings in later years as has my girlfriend. never again have i seen the "ripple in the sky" though. my brother and cousin and i all still talk about it and refresh the story. it has stayed clear in our minds over the years and true to all three of us. if any others have similar stories, tell it. the world needs to know. thank you.
content.summary: Strainge light  radiated frome above and then a red light apeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I work for a construction company driving a 70 ton truck. i was sitting under the trackhoe waiting for my load, when i noticed 3 stars together in the shape of a pyramid.One at 12 o'clock, one at 2 o'clock and the third at 8 o'clock. at first i thought they were just regular stars but then they slowly started to move together in the very same configuration as they had previously been seen. they also started bliking periodically and were moving extremely slow. i would not have noticed it, but, i was always sitting in the exact same spot and they ----- were  not!!!!!!!!!


p.S i thought at the time it was nothing, but now i am not so sure. very strange.It moved out of sight finally over the eastern mountains in n. salt lake.



    

                   m. parks
content.summary: 3 stars converged in a pyramid form

content.detailedDescription:
On tuesday september 9, 2008 around 7:00pm cst i was at my home in prairieville, la and noticed a very bright object moving slowly west in the western sky. i watched it for about a minute then went inside my house to get my camcorder. i recorded the object for a few minutes then went back inside to get my wife. when we came out just a minute later the object was gone. we witnessed a very similar object here at our home on the night of  july 4, 2008.
the object was fairly high and seemed to be moving slowly to the west. the total time i witnessed this object was around 5  minutes. we are about 5 miles southeast of baton rouge, la.
content.summary: Very bright object seen in western sky in baton rouge

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were driving home from grocery shopping. we were heading west on guadalupe road in tempe, az. it was another hot, clear summer day. it was 7:30pm and still well lit. my mom was driving. all of a sudden she gasped and pointed at something way up high out of the view of the windshield. 

i leaned forward and saw a streaking silver object coming down at an angle. my mother told me her first thought was a falling plane. my first thought i told her later was a meteorite. it seemed to fall for a full minute or maybe i just thought time had slowed down. 

it stopped suddenly in the sky and appeared to be above the foothills (guadalupe and ahwatukee edge) over south mountain. but there is really no way to tell how far it was. this is when mom and i really became alarmed. we knew immediately something otherwordly was going on. 

we turned down to grove parkway where we lived, pulled into the driveway, and i ran and got dad and my sister out to the lawn. they wanted to know what was going on. i said, "there's a ufo outside." i had to repeat myself, "there's a ufo outside." i retrieved my binoculars even though i was scared it wouldn't be there when i got back out. 

surely enough, it was still there. it had changed when it had stopped falling from a silver bullet/comet shape to a giant, pearl-like sphere in the sky with a black wedge exactly on the bottom which seemed to be spouting out a clear gas and it was hovering over the mountain. 

i looked through the binoculars, focused in and it was still just a big pearl, except i could see little red sparks of fire shooting off the surface which would zig zag in the air and then blink out. it just stayed there while cars zipped past us on the street. it was bizarre. it didn't seem like anyone else was seeing this. after about 45 minutes, it seemed to be moving with the curve of the earth because it was getting farther and farther away at the same rate of the sun and was slowly coming down. it got dark and finally it was out of sight behind the mountain. 

we turned on the news to see if it was on there. nothing. i personally called luke air force base to see if anything had shown up on their radar. the lady i spoke with said no and noone had called.
content.summary: Big pearl like object hovering over phoenix

content.detailedDescription: I wanted to put this on record to see if others saw it too. i do not beleive they could have missed it.
content.summary: One bright orange light in sky moves rapidly slows moves again and fades comes back 10 minutes later

content.detailedDescription: This is real and happening in this area! have many more photos to share.
content.summary: Last 3 photos of my last report 9/11/08

content.detailedDescription: Shooting pic of sears tower from a moving vehicle via the sun roof was on the expressway. at time of photo object did not appear in frame belive my camera setting was set for moving objects though not sure.When i looked to see the image i had shot i noticed an anomely clearly in the photo i imidiatley started to shoot pictures of the sky around eventhough to the naked eye nothing was visiable the pictures attached are what my camera captured again nothing was visible to the eye i'm guessing the speed it was traveling once i took a look to see what i had shot similair object appeared in photos also took pic of plane in the sky to compare shots from same camera
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Egg,  Oval,  Sphere,  Teardrop
content.summary: Was shooting pic of sears tower object did not appear in frame at time of shot

content.detailedDescription: Please see my last report date 9/11/08 i have many more pictures i would like to share with you.
content.summary: More pictures from my other report on 9/11/08

content.detailedDescription:
I took a drive coming back after dropping my girlfriend off, something told me too, so i ended up in these back roads up in the hills very dark i noticed the stars outside and have always been an admirer so i decided to park. low and behold i noticed a couple of very bright stars in the sky so i focused my attention on them and noticed they would move left to right up and down, not major movements either but they were definetly moving then i noticed the third object and they had formed a triangle these objects were not close to each other. it was very dark since i was away from the city lights and you could see at times smaller star-like less bright objects in the sky moving in the middle of the triangle and towards the brighter star like objects this went on for hours.
i was able to spot probably 30 or more objects in the entire night sky, at first glance these would be "stars" until you noticed the movements.
at times they would become very bright like shine brighter than they already were, i was able to see smaller ones shoot off and then back, it was weird.
after hours of observation i finally went home since the sun was going to be coming up anyway, it was amazing there was just so much activity that when i decided to go home i wasnt even disappointed about not having a camera.
i went out again last night but of coarse it was foggy.
content.summary: Star-like objects in giant triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: My story is this i have discovered how to veiw ufo's daily...I will reveil my secrect in the near future.Thanks.I only have space for 3 photos although i have approximatle 100 from 9/11/2008.
content.summary: This is one of thousands i see daily

content.detailedDescription: It was storming and lightening out side when i was watching the latest news update on the casey anthony case, the reporter was in kissimmee in front of the lawyers office. i was waching the sky behind the reporter when something zipped by, now the broadcast was live and when the object came into view, the camera man was taken off air almost instantly ,  i taped it and by now i have watched it in slow motion over 50 times and what i have without adout is a lowflying disk caught by our local news crew in the daylight, it is so close you can even see how it disturbs the air around it as it moves across the sky. it is jaw dropping,but what do i do, who do i tell?
content.summary: It was a live news broadcast, when a very fast moving disk flew in view of the news camera

content.detailedDescription: It was right before my husband were leaving for work.  he had just bought me a telescope for my birthday (10-08) and we were in the front yard trying to focus on the moon.  i was leaning on my car waiting for him to set it up. i was looking to the east when my pereiferral vision cought something to my left.  i turned to see what it was and there was this big triangle just floating softly over the street and moving very slowly to the south.  there was absolutely no sound or wind from it.  my dog was in the yard and he wasn't disturbed by it!  it continued to float down the street and hovered over the hangers at the roswell industrial center.  we lived about four blocks away from the hanger where the 1947 crash debri was taken.  it hvered there for about 15 seconds then shot straight up and was gone in a split second.  i tried to get my husband's attention but i just couldn't speak!  i did file a report of the incident with the roswell ufo museum the very next day.  i had told mr. glen dennis about it.  the strangest thing was that i wasn't scared during the incident.  it was after that i started to shake from the meer thought of it being so close to me.  i was only about 100ft. away from the road.  and the objest was only as high as the power lines!
content.summary: Objest was about 50ftx50ft triangular, satiny grey w/a light in each corner

content.detailedDescription:
Walking home from local establishment, well lit sky,  dark cross pattern like a plane only large enough to see a simple cross pattern in night sky.
watched for a minute, followed until out of sight, seemed to be flying at the speed of a normal passenger airplane. no lights.
content.summary: Black figure, no lights, cross pattern like airplane,

content.detailedDescription:
My 18 year old daughter actually saw this event tonight and took a picture with her cell phone and sent it to me. i did not witness it, but from her description, i knew this was something extraordinary. the first time she saw it, there was a loud boom and a flash of light. by the time her eyes caught sight of it, the object was at the horizon, moving so fast that she saw tracers/trails behind the lights. it then looped around and flew over the darkened playground in which she was sitting. she  said it was low enough to light up the entire area and absolutely silent, moving extremely slowly. at this point, she took the photo of the object.  she got scared and started walking home.  i called her and while we were talking, it flew over her again very fast.

i have included the one photo she managed to obtain.  i hope it helps.  she was not able to gauge altitude, distance, size, or speed, but i am certain that she would be able to give you an accurate account with the help of someone who is skilled and knowledgeable.

i also spoke with a friend in the military.  he told me some things that i absolutely do not want to repeat in this public forum.  not yet.  please contact me soon and i will discuss with you what i know.  i will say this much.  you absolutely must file a foia request for the radar data immediately!  this thing flew over my neighborhood at least the 3 times that she saw.  this is a military aircraft, allegedly the fastest man has ever known.

one other thing.  i also know what you found on your radar data from january.  please contact me asap.
content.summary: Fast flyover, loop around, slow and low, loop, fast again

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my hot tub looking up and noted three lights traveling from northeast to southwest.  the lights had the appearance of satellites, which i often see.  however, i have never seen three lights traveling in a triangle pattern such as these.   the object or objects appeared to be very high in the sky and moving steadily in what appeared to be a straight line.  there was an airshow in the vicinity (brunswick naval air station) the previous weekend but i heard no engine noises and whatever these objects were, they did not have the appearance of aircraft.  i see a lot of jets pass overhead but sooner or later you hear the noise and see the navigation lights. these lights appeared to be much higher and looked, as i noted, like satellites - just star-like specks of light moving at a steady, even pace.  the formation, traveling with the "point" of the triangle leading the way, drifted till it reached the southwest horizon and then just disappeared over the horizon.
content.summary: Three lights with the appearance of satellites traveling in a triangle formation

content.detailedDescription:
A buddy and i were shooting the breeze around a fire late in the evening when a white-blueish light hit us
we looked to see where it was coming from, we looked up and just above the treeline and saw the light coming from 
what i can only assume the center of the source, 
the source of light was circular in shape  with smaller lights encircled around it
on the left and right handside of the main light was an orange light which seemed indirect as in not aimed downward 
as opposed to the main light source
the main light source kept shooting the bright light down to the ground as if scannning
there was absolutely no sound from it  came towads us stopped for split second did almost a 180 degree turn then it was gone
content.summary: The reason i am reporting this to you now is because i intially sent it to the www.Nhufo.Org and have seen or heard nothing since

content.detailedDescription: On tuesday november 22, 2005 at 7.40 p.M. i was at a nearby neighbors house with some friends. we were out in the backyard. we were grilling barbecue ribs, barbecue chicken, and steaks on the outdoor grills out in the backyard. we looked up and saw 3 circle ufos. they had on the inside of the bottom red, yellow, and green lights then red, yellow, and purple lights then they were a roquefort blue (what i mean by a roquefort blue the lights on the inside of the bottom looked like roquefort and blue cheese salad dressing) they were still roquefort blue then on the inside of the bottom they had red and orange lights mainly red lights then again red, yellow, and green lights and emitted orange beams.                                                                                                                                              then 3 triangler ufos showed up they were purple lighted with red dots on the corner then yellow lighted with red dots on the corner. then as we were still grilling our food barbecue ribs, barbecue chicken, steaks on the outdoor grills out in the backyard the 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had red, yellow, and green lights then red, yellow, and purple lights then one of the circle ufos had red, yellow, and green lights the other circle ufo had red, yellow, and purple lights the other circle ufo had red, yellow, and pink lights thats what they had on the inside of the bottom. and all 3 triangler ufos were roquefort blue with red dots on the corners. they the 3 circle ufos and the 3 triangler ufos all hovered over the treetops then all 3 circle ufos had on the inside of the bottom red, yellow and orange lights then red, yellow, and pink lights then all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had all blue lights. then all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had red and orange lights mainly red lights then all 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom had red, yellow, and green lights then red, yellow, and purple lights then again red, yellow, and green lights and the 3 triangler ufos were pink lighted with red dots on the corners then yellow lighted with red dots on the corners. then all 6 ufos the 3 circle ufos and the triangler ufos were all white lighted the 3 circle ufos on the inside of the bottom were all white lighted and the 3 triangler ufos were all white lighted with no dots on the corners and they disappeared and we didn't see them no more they were going towards the ocean to folley beach i guess they crashed out in the ocean. we saw all of this as we were grilling barbecue ribs, barbecue chicken, and steaks on the outdoor grills out in the backyard.                                                                                                                                           then 2 huge cone ufos showed up they were red on the top and yellow on the bottom then red on top and purple on the bottom they disappeard as fast as they came. and then 3 more triangler ufos showed up they were yellow lighted with green dots on the corners and made a whistling sound and they were gone as fast as they came. then 2 blue diamond ufos showed up and 5 rectangler ufos showed up they were red and blue lighted. then a huge chest ufo showed up it was red, yellow, green, purple, blue, orange, roquefort blue, pink, white, and black. and all of those ufos hovered over the backyard as we were grilling our food and they disappeard they were going toward folley beach i guess they crashed out in the ocean.                                                                                                                                              then we were all done grilling our food the barbecue ribs, barbecue chicken, and steaks on the outdoor grills out in the backyard. we saw the ufos we saw as we were grilling outside. and we took our food of the grills and got ready to eat it. we saw no more ufos. it was a very clear night outside when we were grilling and saw the ufos we saw. me and all my neighbor friends. we just couldn't beilive the ufos we saw. it was really and exciting experience to see the ufos we saw while grilling on the outdoor grills and us all being together.
content.shape: Cone,  Circle,  Diamond,  Square,  Rectagular,  Triangle
content.summary: While shooting the bull at a neighbors house we saw some exciting ufos me and my neighbor friends.

content.detailedDescription:
From a turn-out up angeles crest hwy we saw a star-like object above the city, stationary. after a while we noticed it flashed red, yellow, then blue rapidly. we thought it might be a plane, but it did not appear to be moving. it didn't seem to be doing anything, so we lost interest, but after a few minutes it disappeared.

ten minutes later, it reappeared a bit to the left of where it had been. it was now moving right and we figured it could've been a plane until it started making sudden movements in all directions. it appeared to be dancing, doing things planes can't do. it changed directions very rapidly, at times moving suddenly in the opposite direction. it had the same color pattern as from before.

it returned to the spot we had seen it originally and remained there for a few moments before speeding off away from us. we didn't completely lose sight of it, though it was very faint. it did a similar dancing ritual again at a distance. it moved to the left past the city before dropping suddenly out of sight.
content.summary: Star-like object, moves unlike a plane

content.detailedDescription: We were looking at the veiw and i was taking pictures.  when i came home we seen the saucer shape in the picture.  see attached
content.summary: Saucer shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside talking on the phone around 8pm sun 9/7/08.  looking north towards plymouth meeting.  i noticed a bright orange orb(it was hard to miss) flying accross the sky coming from the nw(316 degrees) heading east. i first thought it was a plane, but it was orange, no blinking lights and the light was big and bright. i followed it accross the sky until it disappeared at about 76 degrees.  another one then appeared around the some area ( 316 degrees).  it also flew towards the east, that is when i ran into get my binocs.  it was not a plane.  it was not a meteor - no tail.  it was orange there was also something coming out of the top.  my fiance also saw it through the binocs and described it as a disc with "fire balls" coming out of it. there were four orbs in total, i did manage to film the last two, the final one disappearing at about 8:15. they all travelled on a straight line, not moving up or down. all four disappeard in the same exact spot. no more followed. the video i have is shaky, i was trying to get the tripod hooked up and i was trying to zoom in to see if i could figure out what it was.  the best shot i have is around 1:30 in my video,  it shows the houses and you can see the orb travelling in the background. this was witnessed by about 6 people.

link to youtube video: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=y3a4tdvksfm

can you please email and let me know what you guys think it is.

thank you.
content.summary: Ufo over philadelphia?? viewed by six people.  4 orange discs/orbs

content.detailedDescription: Around 10 a.M. my wife and i were sitting out in the back yard having coffee. i had just finished relating a dream. interestingly, involving et craft and interaction with a being.  i stood to go inside when i noticed a white object high in the sky.  the sky was totally clear above and to the west with a few clouds far to the east  i immediately sensed that something seemed strange.  i ran and got our binoculars.  we both saw a white spherical object moving north.  we joked that it must be a weather balloon. as we were looking and discussing we noticed four more.  all identical in a row moving north.  these objects were very high in the sky. they blinked in and out of visibility.  we watched until the neighboring buildings blocked our line of sight.
content.summary: Five white spheres in a row at high altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room it was about 10 pm and i remembered i had my backpack in the car.  i went out to get it and i stepped out side and looked up at the moon, i noticed a bright star and i was drawn to it and kept looking at it.  i then thought it must be a plane but it was still and not moving at all.  i looked closer and i noticed it was circular and i thought oh shi* its not a plane i ran in the house and grabbed my cell phone.  as i started recording, the object moved very fast to the left of the moon then down and up back to the right of the moon.  it kept moving and i knew it wasnt a plane! or a shooting star. it kept moving back and fourth up and down it was amazing! then it stopped for a while and just disapeared.  i forgot that i needed something from the car and just went inside and went to sleep.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I thought it was a bright star but it moved

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on porch with my fiance . it was a very clear night at first i thought i was see a shooting star when it was first coming into sight . but as i stared to wait for it to "burn out" it only became more clear it was easily seen in a tripod shape and it was completely silent. on each end of the shape there was like a like but different than an airplane light because the lights were not blinking nor did they reflect off the night sky.It was flying across the sky at the same speed as a typical flying object but also rotating as it was moving foward i live directly in the landing path of the burlington international airport i am very familiar with what airplanes sounds and what they look like when they are landing and taking off . this is nothing like ive ever seen in my entire life. after we could not see it anymore we looked at each other like in disbelief or shock did we just see a ufo? my first reaction was to call anyone service like the airport who may be sky watching or wouldve know of any type of plane that would be this unusally shaped and quiet . the woman said she only passanger planes were arriving last night and there was no plane landing or taking off around the time we had witnessed this unkown aircraft. i dont know if ill ever see somthing like this again but this was truly amazing! i wish i knew if anyone else had witnessed this.
content.summary: Silent triangle shaped object with lights on end of each tip

content.detailedDescription:
I was up on a logging road near church mtn with my friend and we found a vista of mt. baker and stopped to gawk at the awesome beauty of mt. baker. i took four longshot pics of my friend standing in front of some trees with mt baker in the near distance.
i was focussed on trying to get a good picture of her and wasn't looking at the sky. when i got home and downloaded the pics off my olympus camera i noticed five orbs and a disc in one of the shots. none of the other pics taken within one minute showed any anomalies. it wasn't dust on the cam or there would have been similar objects in other pics...The attached pics are cropped from the original photo since my friend isn't here and i didnt know if she would want me to include her in this report. the first is normal, the second a de-enhanced gamma (ms phot editor) and third is a negative edit.
content.summary: One of four portrait/landscape pics shows odd aerial activity

content.detailedDescription:
Wife wakes at at 3:45 as she is sick.  i get up with her and see something out the bathroom window while i am using the bathroom. i live out in the country where it is quite dark and nothing to obscure my view.  i happened to look out the window and saw something small in the sky that was too high in altitude to be a plane.  i then saw it changing colors ans thought again of the lights on the plane, but too high.  i could clearly see that it was changing colors.  i got my binoculars and looked out the window at it.  my first vision i feel that i can not trust as i was unable to reproduce what i first saw.  i thought i saw a triangular shape with lights around the perimeter with rotating colors.  i had my wife look through the glasses and she could clearly see the color changes but not the overall shape of it. i then looked again at it 10 minutes later and could still see it but could no longer make out the shape.  as such i am not sure if what i initially saw shape wise was correct or if it had moved.  my vision is 20/20.  i compared this object to other stars in the sky and while it looked very far away (somewhere over the atlantic i would say) it was larger and brighter, course changing colors too, than any other object in the sky.  i have never seen this before and will look again tonight and from here on out to see if i can see it again.

the early morning was dark but very clear, no wind, rain or anything else to note.

i went to bed ad 4:00am and it was still there.
content.summary: Bright object in sky changing colors: red, white, blue, green

content.detailedDescription: My gf and i were in mio, michigan for a family event today.  we decided to go visit the au sable river just outside of town off of m-33 to see the hydro-electric dam.  when we got there we noticed a few hawks gliding over the river and started to watch them.  after a few moments we both noticed an object in the sky near the sun that was moving towards us.  it seemed to be very high up based on its size, but it was moving incredibly fast.  i've seen airliners flying overhead at 30,000 feet and this was moving much faster.  i've also seen military jets flying overhead and this was also much faster than that.  we expected to hear some sort of noise from the engines, thinking that i was possibly a jet of some sort, but it was absolutely silent from the time we saw it to a few minutes after it had passed.  it was triangular in shape and few straight almost directly overhead.  it was near impossible to judge height based on the lack of noise or noticeable details and the whole experience lasted maybe a few minutes until it was blocked from view by the treeline.  i searched through google for any other people that may have seen something like this in the area or in neighboring states, but haven't seen anything yet.  my gf and i are very skeptical of what we saw today and really want some sort of verification of what it was, whether that's someone else seeing the same thing or some sort of logical explanation. please tell us we're not crazy.
content.summary: Extremely fast moving triangular white/silvery object moving at extremely high speed silently
